description: This is a market on who will win the UFC 263 fight between Deiveson Figueiredo and Brandon Moreno, set to take place on June 12, 2021, at the Gila River Arena in Glendale, Arizona. This market will resolve to “Figueiredo” if Deiveson Figueiredo is declared the winner of the bout, either by KO, TKO, submission, DQ, or decision. This market will resolve to “Moreno” if Brandon Moreno is declared the winner of the bout, either by KO, TKO, submission, DQ, or decision. If the fight ends in a draw or no contest, this market will resolve to 50-50. If the fight is rescheduled to a date on or before July 1, 2021, the same rules will apply. If the fight is postponed to a date after July 1, 2021 or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve $0.65 “Figueiredo”, and $0.35 “Moreno”, in line with pre-fight odds. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.question: Who will win UFC 263: Figueiredo vs. Moreno?
